name: get_codeforces_problems
description: Fetch problems and statistics from Codeforces problemset API based on optional filters like tags, range, and problemset name.

tags.description: Semicolon-separated list of problem tags to filter, e.g., 'dp;greedy'. Optional.

problemsetName.description: Specific problemset name to fetch from (default: all). Optional.

from.description: Index of the first problem to return (1-based). Optional.

count.description: Number of problems to return starting from 'from'. Optional.
